books.description: Musk’s life from his difficult South African childhood to becoming the innovator behind SpaceX, Tesla and SolarCity. 13 hours, 23 minutes unabridged. Read by Fred Sanders.
books.title: ELON MUSK

books.author: Doug Stanton
books.description: Special Forces soldiers fought the Taliban on horseback shortly after 9/11. First published in print as "Horse Soldiers." 16 hours, 40 minutes unabridged. Read by Jack Garrett.
books.title: HORSE SOLDIERS

books.author: Daniel H Pink
books.description: Research reveals the ideal time to make small decisions and big life changes. 5 hours, 46 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.
books.title: WHEN

books.author: J.D. Vance
books.description: A Yale Law School graduate looks at the struggles of America’s white working class through his own childhood in the Rust Belt. 6 hours, 49 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.
books.title: HILLBILLY ELEGY

books.author: Amanda Palmer
books.description: An expansion of a popular TED talk by the singer and blogger about the value of art and of pursuing dreams. 11 hours, 27 minutes unabridged. Read by the author.
